((#{cpDvsnCd} is null) or (#{cpDvsnCd} is not null and a.OSET_DETL_SNO < 900 )) -- CP SET인 경우만 900 제한 and b.DIET_CD = a.ORDR_CD ) a order by decode(nvl(#{spbrCd},'X'), 'Y',
